supplier-subtitle: Connect with your suppliers and get your scope 3 emissions faster and more easily
customer-subtitle: Connect with your customers for easier emission allocation
manage-supplier-subtitle: Invite your suppliers to exchange emissions data and access their carbon footprint details.
manage-customer-subtitle: Invite your customers to exchange emissions data and access their carbon footprint details.
create-supplier-subtitle-1: Invite your first supplier to exchange emissions data and access their carbon footprint details.
create-supplier-subtitle-2: Visit our page <0>Start creating your network</0> to find out all you you need to know on inviting suppliers.
create-customer-subtitle-1: Invite your first customer to exchange emissions data and access their carbon footprint details.
create-customer-subtitle-2: Visit our page <0>Start creating your network</0> to find out all you you need to know on inviting customers.
form-missing-company-tooltip-content: If you can’t find a company that means they are not registered in our platform. You first need to send them an Invite to join
form-no-results: If you can’t find a company that means they are not registered in our platform. You first need to send them an <0>invite to join</0>
form-toast-save-subtitle-success: You'll receive an email when your invitation is accepted
invite-form-note-label: Add a note to the invitation
invite-form-new-company-explainer: The selected company isn't registered on our platform. Please, provide their details to send the invitation
incoming-relationships-subtitle: Companies that have requested to connect with your company as {{ noun }}
incoming-relationships-subtitle-network: Companies that have requested to connect with your company
incoming-relationship-accept-success: You are now connected to {{ companyName }}
incoming-relationship-reject-success-sub: We’ll inform {{ companyName }} of your decision
company-not-found-in-seth: This company is not part of our platform, we need their contact email to sent a direct invite
invite-form-company-select-placeholder: Enter 3 or more characters to start searching
invite-form-company-select-tooltip-conte: If you can’t find a company, it may mean that they don’t have a D-U-N-S number. Please <0>contact our support team</0> who will help you with the next steps
error-already-connected: You are already connected with {{ companyName }}
error-connection-pending: An invitation has already been sent to this this company
error-connection-declined: Your invitation has previously been declined by this company. Close the module, navigate to "STATUS" in the list and press "Re-send".
error-user-exists: This email is already assigned to another company in our system. We advise you to confirm with your supplier their reporting corporate entity name and contact details.
error-vetoed-company: We are currently unable to invite <selectedCompany></selectedCompany> to join the Hub. Please <inputErrorLink>contact our support team</inputErrorLink> for further details.
new-connection-modal-save-subtitle-succe: Did you know that you can help your supply chain network to better understand your company decarbonisation strategy, by allowing the to see your public data? Got to the your privacy settings to update your preferences.
invitation-sent-modal-text-1: An invitation was sent to this company. You’ll be informed by e-mail when the company accepts or rejects your invitation.
invitation-sent-modal-text-2: If you want to learn more about the invitation process visit our page <0>Start creating your network</0> page.
dropdown-placeholder: Search by company, inviter and sector...
